split_.description: Splits the main dataframe object into multiple DataSpace objects,         one for each unique value in the specified column.

col.description: Name of the column to split by.

returns.description:
A dictionary with the unique values in the specified column as
keys and a corresponding `DataSpace` object as the value.

drop.description: Removes the specified columns from the main `pl.DataFrame` object in-place.

*cols.description: Names of the columns to remove.

add.description: Adds a new column to the main `pl.DataFrame` object with the

value.description: Default value for the new column.

rename.description: Renames a column in the main `pl.DataFrame` object in-place.

source_col.description: Name of the column to rename.

keep.description: Limits the main `pl.DataFrame` object to the specified columns.

*cols.description: Names of the columns to keep.

copycol.description: Copies the values from one column to another column

origin_col.description: Name of the column to copy values from.

dest_col.description: Name of the column to copy values to.
